nodes.description: Represents a physical or logical camera device.
An operation or command performed on the device (e.g., Adjust_Pan, Enable_Privacy_Mask).
A specific property or value related to a device or action (e.g., Max_Pan_Angle, Zoom_Limit, Temperature).
A rule or restriction applied to actions or device states (e.g., Privacy_Zone, Max_Pan, Night_Mode_Required).
A physical or logical area relevant to device operation (e.g., Zone-B, Rest Area).
A step in a standard operating procedure.
A metric or standard used to validate actions or device states.

edges.description: Indicates the action is performed on the device.
Device has a constraint (e.g., Max_Pan, Privacy_Zone).
Action is subject to a constraint.
Defines the sequence of SOP steps.
Device is located at a specific location.
Action is performed at a specific location.
Action requires validation by a metric.

logic_notes: Constraints can be applied to both Device and Action nodes.
To express 'Action A is forbidden under Condition B', create an Action node, a Constraint node, and link them with HAS_CONSTRAINT.
SOP_Step nodes are sequenced using NEXT_STEP edges; branching/loops can be represented by multiple NEXT_STEP edges.
Validation_Metric nodes ensure traceability from Action to standard/criteria.
